InstructionData.Title: Temp Rocket
InstructionData.Author: Renrek
InstructionData.Instructions:
#Automated rocket controller script - CowsAreEvil
alias command d0 alias returnlever d1 alias launchbutton d2 alias display d3
alias fuelLevel r1
define LAUNCH 1 define TRAVEL 2 define WAITING 4 define RETURN 5 define HOME 6
start: jal displayFuel yield l r0 launchbutton Setting beqz r0 start #button has been pressed s command Activate LAUNCH travel: jal displayFuel yield l r0 command Mode beq r0 TRAVEL travel #have arrived so activate collectors sb -1446002463 Activate 1 sb 74521920 Activate 1 sb -2027419821 Activate 1 mine: jal displayFuel yield l r0 command Fuel ble r0 600 return l r0 returnlever Setting beq r0 1 return l r0 command CollectableGoods bnez r0 mine #finished mining s command Activate 0 yield s command Activate TRAVEL j travel
return: s command Activate RETURN
j start
displayFuel: l fuelLevel command Fuel s display Setting fuelLevel j ra
